Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Perfected Mind]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Perfected Form]

You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.
name: Perfection Domain
